name: Bobs Shrunken Adventure
description:
The game could be a bit loud when you open it

Bobs shrunken adventure is a short puzzle game about Bob, who got shrunk and is now trapped.  As Bob you have to solve puzzles and push around dices...

I would go one, but since I ran out of time, there isn't anything more to say about this Game.

I recommend playing it with a controller, but you can also play it with keyboard, although this makes it quite difficult tot steer bob.

Keybinds

Controller: South Button (XBOX: A) Interact

Keyboard: E - Interact
